name: "Peter Peter Caviar Eater" Trivia Game | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which is the name of Lois' aunt who dies when she comes to visit the family?
questions.explanation:
Aunt Marguerite.

	Aunt Marguerite died upon entering the Griffin house.  She was extremely wealthy and owned a mansion in Newport which Lois and Peter inherited.

questions.text: What job did Peter have when he met Lois?
questions.explanation:
Towel Boy.

	Peter handed out towels to all of the friends and family of Lois' Aunt Marguerite when they went to the pool.  Lois met Peter on one of her visits.

questions.text: What old friend did Lois meet at the funeral?
questions.explanation:
Coco.

	Coco is another rich woman who Lois was a friend of back when she had a lot of money.  Coco had also met Peter back when he was a towel boy.

Newport.

	Peter and Lois inherit Cherrywood when Aunt Marguerite dies and they decide to live there because Peter sells their old house.

questions.text: During the song when the Griffins arrive at the manor, who makes cake?
questions.explanation:
Blake.

	The song "This House is Freakin' Sweet" was nominated for an Emmy Award in 2000.

questions.text: Name the TV show Peter watches that causes Brian to zap him with the shock therapy machine.
questions.explanation:
Ricki Lake.

	Brian was trying to teach Peter how to act polite.  If Peter even glanced at Ricki Lake, he would be shocked.  Obviously, Peter watches "Ricki Lake".

questions.text: What does Peter bid on at the auction?
questions.explanation:
A vase.

	Peter bids an astonishing hundred million dollars on a vase for Lois' bathroom.  Unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money to pay for it.

questions.text: What let the Griffins pay for Peter's auction bid?
questions.explanation:
Pictures.

	Peter finds pictures of famous presidents with women in a secret panel behind a portrait.  Cherrywood was actually the first Presidential brothel.

questions.text: What happens in the end of the show?
options: The family stays at Cherrywood Manor
The family sues the auction company
The family wins a hundred million dollars
questions.explanation:
The family watches TV.

	Like many other episodes, all of the problems are resolved, and the family watches TV.  This time, they watch "The Cosby Show".

questions.text: Does Chris have a speaking part in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Chris only has a few minor lines in this episode.  All of the other characters had plenty of lines.
